error.api: The JIRA API returned an error when creating. Make sure your registration is correct, say "whoami" in a private conversation with me to find your the username you're currently registered with.

assign.success: I successfully assigned you to issue {{issueKey}}. Please doublecheck JIRA just to be sure. Robots make mistakes you know.

register.success: Your registration was successfull with username: {{username}}. If you want to change your registration say `register "[username]"` again.

error.no_email: It seems like you send me an email address, please try again and use the username from your profile instead.
error.no_result: I can't seem to find your username, please make sure you send me your username between double quotes (`register "[username]"`).

link.success: The link between {{issue1}} & {{issue2}} was successfully created. Please double check JIRA to make sure that it was done correctly.

error.api: I tried to link two issues but I failed. :disappointed: There was an error when requesting the API, please try again later
error.message: I tried to link two issues but I failed. :disappointed: I couldn't find the link type in your message. Please follow the following pattern: *link REF-<number> is blocked by RE-<number>*. Link type can be one of the following: is blocked by, relates to, is duplicated by or is caused by.

error.not_found: I thought I heard you talking about an issues just a second ago, but I was unable to find it on JIRA. I'm sorry. :disappointed:

whoami.title: Your user data
whoami.text: This is the data that I have from <@{{userId}}>

help.text: I have a lot of features. They trigger based on different words. This can be confusing sometimes, even though they are quite straight forward. Here is a list of my skills:

assign.title: Assign me to [issueKey]
assign.text:
This will assign you to the issueKey you mention. This requires a the register process to be completed.
_Triggers in:_ direct message and mention

link.title: Link [issueKey1] is ["blocked by", "duplicated by", "caused by", "related to"] [issueKey2]
link.text:
Link the issueKey1 to IssueKey2 with a type that you specify.
_Triggers in:_ direct message and mention

register.title: Register "[JIRA Username]"
register.text:
Register yourself with your JIRA username to be able to use the user specific commands.
_Triggers in:_ direct message

whoami.title: Whoami
whoami.text:
Show the user if you finished the register process.
_Triggers in:_ direct message

error.user_get: There was a problem when getting you from the database. Please say "register" in a private conversation with me to start the registration process.
error.user_none: I was unable to find you in my brain. Please say "register" in a private conversation with me to start the registration process.
error.save: Something went wrong while saving, I'm sorry. :disappointed: Please try again, if it still doesn't work contact my creator Johan van Eck.

meta.love: Aahh... I love you too! :heart: But just know that I will never love you like I love my creator: Johan van Eck.
